basic.description:
Review of the French language in the North American context: written and oral exercises, compositions, short readings. Emphasis on grammar and vocabulary.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Français Intensif II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from FREN P10; FREN P11; FREN P12
One-way Exclusion    May not be taken with or after FREN 100; FREN 101; FREN 102; FREN 110; FREN 118; FREN 219; FREN 320
